wiki.summary: Incorrect tag for Verwüstung / Invoke the Dark Age. Debut full length album released Nov. 1994 on CD by Napalm Records. The first press has a black & white cover (limited to 5000 copies), the American edition and the second press have a color cover. Reissued 2006 on 12" vinyl by Chaos Sacrum records with new cover artwork, as three different colored vinyls: black, white, and white splatter. Reissued 2007 on cassette tape by Division Nordwolf with new cover artwork. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: Incorrect tag for Verwüstung / Invoke the Dark Age. Debut full length album released Nov. 1994 on CD by Napalm Records. The first press has a black & white cover (limited to 5000 copies), the American edition and the second press have a color cover. Reissued 2006 on 12" vinyl by Chaos Sacrum records with new cover artwork, as three different colored vinyls: black, white, and white splatter. Reissued 2007 on cassette tape by Division Nordwolf with new cover artwork. Produced and mixed by Georg Hrauda and Abigor at Tonstudio Hörnix on June 27 and 28, and July 4, 6, and 13, 1994. Lineup: P.K. - Guitars T.T. - Guitars, Drums, Bass, Keyboards Silenius - Vocals Guest/session members: Rune (Abigor's vocalist from '93-'94) - Keyboards, Songwriting (Tracks 3 & 9) Read more on Last.fm.
